item.title: 2022 RUSSIAN INVASION OF UKRAINE
item.description:
The War





Tribute to the Ukrainian defenders of Mariupol, glory to Ukraine By ÊàòÊñóÊ∞ëÊóèÁúü‰∏çË°å‚Äã

To Sep 25, 2022

Oct 2, 2022

Cute pig, Lyman

üîó

Finally together: the commanders from Azovstal, released from Russian captivity, met with their families
Oct 3, 2022

Balls of our warriors in the south #Kherson pic.twitter.com/IQ4yXzVy9p

— –†—É–¥–∏–π –ë—É–¥–¥–∞ (@GingerBuddaa) October 15, 2022

üì∑: Ukrainian service members attend a flag raising ceremony in the town of Lyman, recently liberated by the Ukrainian Armed Forces, amid Russia's attack on Ukraine, in Donetsk region, Ukraine, October 4, 2022.

(Reuters) https://t.co/euQWwgHPmv pic.twitter.com/PqRvZC8Y56

— Voice of America (@VOANews) October 5, 2022

bridge to crimea blown up.
kherson (which supplies crimea) soon to be retaken.

for putin, these are the most threatening losses of the war. pic.twitter.com/u8W6yPB8oE

— ian bremmer (@ianbremmer) October 8, 2022

Bridge to crimea blown up

üîó

After being wounded, Major Zelenyuk did not leave the battlefield and continued to destroy the enemy


A wounded Ukraine soilder with his girlfriend

üá∫üá¶Good morning, its day 235 in #Ukraine and i woke up at 4am, instead of going back to sleep i thought about how wonderful it is to have so much support from the whole world‚ù§Ô∏è
This is our famous sniper Evgenia getting married!
Dear husband, don't cheat, you wont hear it coming‚ò†Ô∏è pic.twitter.com/BNGpllJPSa

— Sofia Ukraini (@SlavaUk30722777) October 16, 2022

Kateryna “Birdie” Polishchuk from Azovstal

Mykhailo Dianov from Azovstal
